question_content.description:
### Problem12

When double buffering is enabled by calling enableDoubleBuffering(), all drawing takes place on the _____(0)\___ canvas. The offscreen canvas is not diplayed; it exists only in computer memory. Only when you call _____(1)\___ (type a method name. Remember to have '()' at the end) does your drawing get copied from the offscreen canvas to the onscreen canvas (literally from sec-1.5) 

Excerpt From
Computer Science
Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin
